announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 25th May, 2025. Offertory will be led by Sunday borns and Christian Fathers Association. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 6th Sunday of Easter

announcements.details: Laudamus 2025 comes off on the 25th of May, 2025 at St Bakhita Parish. Featuring in this year's concert are Joshua, Nacee and Ohemaa Mercy. Tickets go for 100 cedis, available at the church premises.
announcements.title: Laudamus 2025

events.details: Date: 25th May, 2025 | Venue: St Bakhita Catholic Church | Time: 5pm
events.subtitle: This year's concert features Joshua, Nacee and Ohemaa Mercy.
